title: Solar for everyone and open source / Sonne für alle und Open Source
abstract:
We are Libre Solar and we are developing modular open source hardware to make energy accessible to everyone.

In our session we will start with a short introduction about social and ecological aspects. Then we will have a 15 minutes dive into the technical background of the Libre Solar components like MPPT charge controller, battery management system (BMS) and communication interfaces. After our input there is room for knowlege sharing and discussions.
